job_description: A job opening is available in the data science platform of the Research Group "Host Pathogen Interactions" at the next possible starting dateArtificial Intelligence / Machine Learning Expert (m/f/d)About the Paul-Ehrlich-InstitutWe are a senior federal authority responsible for vaccines and biomedicines that performs scientific research in the field of life sciences.
